data.description:
Pre-order to grab the exclusive 'Pre-Order Party' bonus level at launch!

# WELCOME TO CULT ACTION PARADISE
 
Leap into the **VENDETTA FOREVER: DEMO** now!  Get a free hands-on with five frantic scenes and experience the future of the frenetic shooter. 

**VENDETTA FOREVER** fuses rapid-fire tactical gunplay, effortless acrobatic style and the all-new LO-KILL-MOTION mechanic, to create an unapologetic love letter to classic action cinema. 
 
# POWERED BY LO-KILL-MOTION
{1017305402940936}
Shoot to kill. Kill to move.  Dispatch foes and seize their weapon in mid-air to propel yourself forward. Strategically plot your next move with each takedown in a frantic fight to the bitter end. 
 
# RINSE, REPEAT, RELOAD – PREPARE FOR LAUNCH!
{1553750138883192}
Hone your skills, as this is just a taste of the frenetic action to come. In the full release, you’ll rampage through 60 snackable slices of ultra-stylish strategic shooting with an outrageous arsenal of iconic weaponry. 

Check out the full game page for more and pre-order now for exclusive bonus content.

changelog.change_log:
Build notes - v0.1.1.2
- Fixed the issue causing the oculus system recenter getting the horizon very wrong
- Adjusted chopper health in Gunship
- Added a damage flash to the helicopter in Gunship, chopper frame will now flash red with each hit of damage.
- Fixed some issues with localised text overlapping
- Small balancing tweaks
- Fixed an issue with Modifier challenge progress bars
- Minor text changes

Fix for Tutorial reset demo getting stuck if you reset early.  Fix for LevelCompletionDisplay showing after level reset if you reset before display is shown.  SaveData file renamed to prevent old saves from breaking game.  Added Meg and Michael's graffiti to slums.
Accuracy bug fixes, perfection fix.  System splash switched to VF.  AllCollectibles achievement fix.  Dual Core mode for Quest2.
